paragraphs.content: Psalm 34
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 34

paragraphs.content: A Psalm of David, when he changed his behaviour before Abimelech; who drove him away, and he departed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Psalm of David, when he changed his behaviour before Abimelech; who drove him away, and he departed.

paragraphs.content: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

paragraphs.content: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul shall make her boast in the Lord: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.

paragraphs.content: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O magnify the Lord with me, and let us exalt his name together.

paragraphs.content: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I sought the Lord, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.

paragraphs.content: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.

paragraphs.content: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This poor man cried, and the Lord heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.

paragraphs.content: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

paragraphs.content: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

paragraphs.content: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O fear the Lord, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.

paragraphs.content: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.

paragraphs.content: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
paragraphs.contentHtml: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?

paragraphs.content: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.

paragraphs.content: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

paragraphs.content: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.

paragraphs.content: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The face of the Lord is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.

paragraphs.content: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

paragraphs.content: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the Lord delivereth him out of them all.

paragraphs.content: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.

paragraphs.content: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.

paragraphs.content: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
